section_title: PROTOCOL ARTICLE 3.14 (ADVERSE EFFECTS AND RESPONSE MEASURES):
sentences: Al Waleed Hamad Al-Malik (UAE) reported lack of agreement over whether the group should focus on substance or procedure, particularly whether to focus on a recent workshop or on proposals to merge this item with discussions under Protocol Article 2.3.
Chair Becker noted that the absence of agreed conclusions will be reflected in the SBI 25 report and the item will be included on the SBI 26 agenda.
